name: Heroku
description: A cloud platform as a service (PaaS) supporting several programming languages
summary: Heroku is a cloud platform as a service supporting Ruby, Java, Node.js, Scala, Clojure, Python and PHP
features: Decentralized approach to run web apps and workers
Extendible application based on build packs
Command line and web APIs available for greater and deeper interaction
scenario: When you are used to git and need an easy way to deploy your app
When you need an optimized and decentralized infrastructure to deploy your apps
When you want to focus on the development of your app and not on the infrastructure (optimal for small startups)

similar.relationship: An heroku alternative built especially for php developers
An heroku alternative built by Google using google technology and infrastructure
An heroku alternative with a particular regard for Python
